title: Pacha Style Armchair Black/Creamy Boucle/Boucle
body: Curved and shaped like clouds, this Mobelaris style of the Pacha Style Armchair gives a relaxing vibe to any styled home. A 1975 original of renowned French furniture and interior designer,Â Pierre Paulin, that creates the feeling of floating in clouds, combining comfort and creative style. This iconic lounge chair lends 70's elegance to any room.
